metadata.task_description: Create a new project named 'Website Redesign' with layout 'List', add description 'Complete redesign of company website with modern UI/UX', and add 3 tasks: 'Design mockups', 'Frontend implementation', and 'QA testing'

judgement.reasoning: The agent successfully completed all parts of the task. It navigated to Asana, initiated the creation of a blank project named 'Website Redesign', and confirmed the 'List' layout (by navigating to the List tab). It correctly added the required description 'Complete redesign of company website with modern UI/UX' in the Overview section and then added the three specified tasks ('Design mockups', 'Frontend implementation', and 'QA testing') in the List view. The trajectory was logical and efficient. Although there was a minor tool error in Step 5 (a failed redundant click), it did not affect the overall outcome. Screenshots were taken at major state changes as requested.
